name: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring is an action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It features an open-world environment and is known for its challenging gameplay and intricate lore.

name: Horizon Forbidden West
description: Horizon Forbidden West is an action-adventure game developed by Guerrilla Games. It is a sequel to Horizon Zero Dawn and takes players to a stunning post-apocalyptic world filled with robotic creatures and mysteries.

name: Valorant
description: Valorant is a tactical first-person shooter developed and published by Riot Games. It combines precise gunplay with unique character abilities, making it a popular choice in the competitive gaming scene.

name: Among Us
description: Among Us is a multiplayer party game developed by InnerSloth. Players work together on a spaceship but must identify and vote off impostors among them. It became a viral hit for its social deduction gameplay.

name: Resident Evil Village
description: Resident Evil Village is a survival horror game developed and published by Capcom. It is the eighth main installment in the Resident Evil series and features a captivating storyline and terrifying creatures.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
description: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart is a platformer/shooter game developed by Insomniac Games. It showcases the power of the PlayStation 5 with stunning graphics and fast-paced action across dimensions.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action role-playing game developed by CD Projekt. It immerses players in a dystopian future, offering a rich narrative and vast open-world exploration.

name: Deathloop
description: Deathloop is an immersive first-person shooter developed by Arkane Studios and published by Bethesda Softworks. It combines time-loop gameplay with stylish combat and a unique narrative.
